summary: Would-be filmmaker Sophie left Africa for Canada as a child. After graduating, she films the daily doings as part of a summer job at a fair. When pointing the camera at herself, she reveals painful secrets from the past..
cast: Marie-Evelyne Lessard|Marc-André Brunet|Normand Daoust|Stephanie Dubois|Alexandre Dubois|Michel Vézina|Alexandre Castonguay

title: Les manèges humains
